snippet.title: Adrenalin Connection (アドレナリン･コネクション ) for the NEC PC-88
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

PC-98


Game description:

Adrenalin Connection is a visual novel where you are a teacher at a high school and you have to investigate what's up with the "Adrenalin Connection". You also have to get together with Maria. If you don't or get together with another woman you will get a bad ending.
